channel.title: Pet System
channel.description: i was wondering if anyone know the source for this server i used to play. It had an epic pet system. For example, you have a pet dragon that actually attack npc and players. It start off as a bronze dragon, but as it level up, it turn into iron, then steel, then mithril, and finally into Frost dragon. Ive been searching for the developer of this server and have no luck :(. So please help.

item.title: Pet System
item.dc:creator: @pansong pansong
item.description:
@pansong wrote:

popcorn57:

Not sure sorry man but if you want me to code that in for you on a PI source you got just let me know

but the thing is, this server was on a 700+ source.

Read full topic

item.title: Pet System
item.dc:creator: @popcorn57 popcorn57
item.description:
@popcorn57 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:550555”]To be honest, writing something like this would be very easy. Just about any novice to intermediate programmer could tackle this.
And, don’t mention anything about payments on moparscape. It’s one of the few rules.

I don’t think they really made the rule for this section, but it still applies.[/quote]

^^^ But I can do for you nevertheless message me your skype name and we get her done

item.title: Pet System
item.dc:creator: @pansong pansong
item.description:
@pansong wrote:

i was wondering if anyone know the source for this server i used to play. It had an epic pet system. For example, you have a pet dragon that actually attack npc and players. It start off as a bronze dragon, but as it level up, it turn into iron, then steel, then mithril, and finally into Frost dragon. Ive been searching for the developer of this server and have no luck :(.
So please help.
